caption.p: Statistical correlation between the regional distribution of COVID-19 cases and the air quality parameters in Italy: incidence of Covid-19 cases vs levels of A) NO 2, B) PM 2.5 and C) PM 10 (four years means); incidence of Covid-19 cases vs number of days per year exceeding regulatory limits of D) O 3 and E) PM 10 (three years means). Data obtained and elaborated from EEA (2019; 2020), ICPD (2020), and Legambiente (2018, 2019; 2020).
